bibl.title: Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud
bibl.note: An unnoticed statement in the Bellum Alexandrinum (ยง12) bears evidence that the council of Alexandria continued to function to the very end of Ptolemaic rule. Alexandria acquired a council under the Romans some two centuries later.
bibl.seg: EL 'ABBADI Mustafa, The Problem of the Council of Alexandria: Can a Solution be Found?
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud = BSAA 45 (1993) pp. 1-6.
